text: Konrad Krajewski (born 25 November 1963) is a Polish Roman Catholic cardinal. He has been the Almoner of His Holiness since 2013. == Early life and education == Konrad Krajewski was born in Łódź, Poland. He was ordained a priest on 11 June 1988 by Bishop Władysław Ziółek. He studied in Rome and obtained degrees in liturgy. == Ecclesiastical career == Krajewski worked in the Vatican as a Papal Master of Ceremonies. In 2013, Pope Francis appointed him as the Almoner of His Holiness. He was consecrated as a bishop by Pope Francis on 17 September 2013. On 28 June 2018, Pope Francis made him a cardinal. He is known for his work with the poor and homeless. == References == == Other websites == * Dicastery for the Service of Charity Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Polish cardinals Category:Polish Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Łódź
